pc.label: The Wizard
pc.name: Elf, High Wizard 5
pc.languages:
You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and Draconic.
Source: Player's Handbook, p. 24

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 1d4 + 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff - Focus
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 bludgeoning damage.
